jd: From: Manish Kumar, Scalable Systems manish.kumar@scalable-systems.com Reply to: manish.kumar@scalable-systems.com Position: Azure Data Analytics Solution ArchitectLocation: Wilmington, DE15+ years of overall experience in architecting and building data and analytics solutions, including atleast one Azure Data Lake Implementation• Deep understanding of ETL, reporting, data modeling concepts and data warehouse architecture• Experienced in analysis, design, data modelling and effort estimation.• Hands on experience of working in ETL tools like Informatica, etc. and reporting tools like Power BI, Tableau.• Experience in working with SAP, SAP BW, SAP HANA as sources and data extraction from SAP sources to EDW/Azure.• Deep understanding of Azure cloud components like Azure Data Factory, Azure Synapse (SQL Data Warehouse), Azure Data Lake Storage (ADLS) and Azure Analysis Service (AAS), DataBricks• Hands on experience of working with ADLS, ADF, DataBricks, PySpark, DeltaLake.• Excellent communication, presentation, and interpersonal skills• Experienced in working in a customer facing role.
